attributes.action: BAN manufacturers from Marketing UNHEALTHY food at our Children (eg using bright packaging, use of well known characters etc)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: BAN manufacturers from Marketing UNHEALTHY food at our Children (eg using bright packaging, use of well known characters etc.)  Rubbish food should not be dressed up in order to seduce our children.  Similarly, food aimed at children should not contain any 'unhealthy' ingredients, eg. additives, colourings, excessive sugar/salt etc.
